note: Conventional oil production peaked in 2005, unconventional in 2018. 8 billion humans all want large homes, air travel, and personal automobiles. Our number grows by 80,000/day, 220 million/year. Disease, famine, mass migration, and resource wars caused by the climate/energy/population problem are here. We need a massive global family planning program and the best time to start is 1950. The second best time is now.
